description:
Fast, async, stream-based link checker written in Rust

Fast, async, stream-based link checker written in Rust.
Finds broken URLs and mail addresses inside Markdown, HTML, reStructuredText, websites and more!
Overview
Minor improvements. The plugin request chain is ready for use. Take a look at examples/chain/chain.rs to see how it can be used.What's Changed
Miscellaneous and Others ðŸ””
- Gracefully handle invalid URIs by @mre in #1414
- Chain visibility by @thomas-zahner in #1415
- Fix spelling; Github -> GitHub by @jbampton in #1416
- Fix spelling and remove unneeded trailing whitespace by @jbampton in #1417
New Contributors
- @jbampton made their first contribution in #1416
Full Changelog: https://github.com/lycheeverse/lychee/compare/v0.15.0...v0.15.1
